content: these crochet shorts are actually beginner friendly and very easy to make and they also won t take long to make and they look really cute this crochet shorts pattern includes an 7 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #3 light/dk yarn i used ice yarn organic baby cotton #3 light/dk yarn crochet hook size 3 mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker notes this crochet pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 450 490 560 610 680 730 yards gauge blocked waistband 20 half_double_crochet x 13 row = 4 body 20 half_double_crochet x 14 row = 4 measurements after blocked waist circumference 24 92 26 46 28 30 30 15 32 33 84 inches hip circumference 32 40 34 40 36 80 39 20 41 60 44 inches length 13 40 13 68 14 45 14 47 15 51 15 80 inches thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
